A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: BEST STAR WARS MOVIE EVER. Huge epic story arc for Luke Skywalker. Unbelievable character development for Rey and Kylo Ren(who is the most interesting villain in the history of star wars). Epic Light saber battle-check. Visually gorgeous battle scenes.. check. Heroic moments for the other characters-check. It has humor\, tears\, excitement-everything. I've seen it twice already and cant wait to go back. Don't believe the minority who are manipulating the audience score.This movie is wonderful.
